content.new: Contacts between Atlas' thighs and pelvis collision models and the polaris vehicle seem extremely slippery. Just sitting in the car and not performing any motions, there is enough drift to cause the robot to move from right in front of the steering wheel
content.old: Contacts between Atlas' thighs and pelvis collision models and the polaris vehicle seem extremely slippery. Just sitting in the car and not performing any motions, there is enough drift to cause the robot to move from right in front of the steering wheel

issue.title: Atlas drifting while seated in car
